review: Tries to understand your symptoms. Does proper check-up and tests to find out the root cause. Thorough gentleman !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wife Kameswari has been a patient of NIDDM,Hypothyroidism and general weakness.Recently she developed high heart rate, chest pain and ischemic symptoms. ECG taken outside had shown ischemic changes and inferior wall changes. Some one suggested Dr Chopra and we visited him immediately. He immediately took ECG which was some what better than.  earlier one. Without relenting Dr Chopra took Echo also which confirmed that there were no problems with heart except anginal pain.He apprised that only peripheral issues were there and everything is ok. His approach is plain and no unwarranted alerts and the best part is he has ECG, ECHO and TMT and the diagnosis is very fast due to it and the rates are also very reasonable. It’s a pro patient approach *** * **** **** ****** * **** **** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
* ******** *** * **** *********** ********** **** I want to share with you all in the hope that it will help others avoid a similar situation. ** * ******* **** * **** ******* ***** ***** ******* *** * *** ** ** **** ******* ***** *** * ***** ** ****** I went to Dr. Vikas Chopra for a routine check-up and brought along my recent medical reports, which clearly showed that I was in good health. Despite this, Dr. Chopra insisted that I undergo a series of additional tests at his clinic.

I trusted his judgment, thinking that a doctor’s primary concern should be the well-being of their patients. However, I soon realized that this was not the case. *** ********** ***** ** ******* ****** ********** *********** *** **** ******* * *** *** *** ** **** **** ******* The bill for these tests came to an astonishing 6000 rupees, a sum that is a significant burden for me as a student from a financially struggling family.

**** *** ************ ************* *** *** *********** **** *** ****** ****** **** ********** ** *** ******* **** ** ** ******* ******** ****** ** **** ** ***** ***** ******* ** *** ** ***** **** ********* *** ** ******* ***** ***** *** ********* ***** ** *** ***** ** ** **** ** *** ****** ********* ** ** ********** ******* **** * *** ******* ********* *** ****** ******* ** ******** *** **************** ********** *** **** ** ******* ******** *** ************** ********** **** *** ***** ****** *** *** ***** ** *** ********* *** *** ******* ***** *** ****** * I knew my health was okay* *** ***** *********** ***** **** ****** ** ***** ** ******* ******* ********* It was an upsetting and demoralizing experience that no one should have to go through.

I strongly advise anyone looking for medical care to steer clear of Dr. Vikas Chopra. ***** *** **** ****** ******* ** ***** *** *** ******* *** ** *** ******* ***** ******** *** ******* **** ****** *** **** ******** ******* ****** **** ** ** ********* ** **** ************ ************* **** **** ** ******* ** ****** * *** ******* ****** **** ************ *** **** ************** *** ********* **** **** * **** Thank you for listening, and please be cautious when choosing your healthcare providers.

The experience at the clinic was horrible. I had gone there to get my ECG reports checked. The doctor ************ ** **** *** ****** stated got the ECG and Heart ECO done again. *** ******* ****** *** ** ** ********** *** ****** Later, I got the same test done twice Considering I had no symptoms and the reports turned out to be completely normal. *** **** ** ** ** **** ********* ** ******* ***** **** ** *** ****

Half the problem is gone if your doctor listens to u patiently and makes an effective communication with you. Dr. Chopra is one of those patient doctors.

Also his clinic is technically equipped to do all heart related tests on the spot giving patients an instant reports on their ailments.

Wonderful experience and highly recommended.

Although the doctor did not explain my heart condition the medicines he prescribed worked well. I had to conduct online research to know what the test readings meant. Overall, I would say he needed to elaborate on the test results to dispel patient doubts. The medicines made me feel much better.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pain in Left part of Chest,
review: I was skeptic at first, however after i met the doctor i had to change my view. First of all he paitently listened my problems, then gave a detailed review of same. He was very polite and made sure i understand the reason for my pain. He gave minimal medication. Not only i am feeling much better now, i am really in awe with the simplicity and the kindness of him and the simple treatment from him. I would highly recommend him for sure.
He was able to make understand reason of my high bp. Very professional. Hope will be able to get proper recovery
Visited first time he said we can talk in whatsapp also and after getting report I sent him whatsapp message with report but he never answer very disappointed ,will never visit again .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I'm genuinely satisfied with the treatment given by Dr. Vikas chopra...
He listened my problem patiently , cleared all of the doubts regarding uneven heartbeat, prescribed minimal medicine...
Overall happyy with the service..
Thanku Dr. Chopra....
Tries to understand your symptoms. Does proper check-up and tests to find out the root cause. Thorough gentleman !
